channel.title: The Daily Matchmass
channel.description: Daily briefing covering Lakers basketball, surf conditions, and California news
channel.itunes:author: Ben

item.title: The Daily Matchmass — 2026-02-25
item.description: Experience the highs and lows of the sports and tech worlds, from the Lakers' heartbreaking buzzer-beater loss to the rapid integration of AI agents as official team members in the workplace. This episode also dives into major policy moves regarding international data privacy and the latest creative updates from Adobe and Amazon.

item.title: The Daily Matchmass — 2026-02-24
item.description: Dive into a high-stakes standoff between the Pentagon and Anthropic over AI safety guardrails and the latest $500 million investment in the race for chip dominance. This episode also explores the rise of workplace AI agents, regulatory battles facing tech giants, and a key preview of tonight’s Lakers matchup against the Orlando Magic.
